pli-tv-bi-vb-pj1:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj1:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj1:0.4: 1. The training rule on sexual intercourse
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj1:1.1: This rule is omitted in all manuscripts. Tradition says it is similar to Pārājika 1 for monks.
